title: Mobs From Minecraft Earth Resource Pack
briefDescription: Make some of your mobs look like those seen in the Minecraft Earth beta, this pack will be updated as they reveal new mobs, I ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Make some of your mobs look like those seen in the Minecraft Earth beta, this pack will be updated as they reveal new mobs, I will also improve existing textures when I find better pictures of the mobs like the Moobloom and the Mushroom Chiken that have only shown the silhouette so I made it as I think it will looks like, but it may be different
I do not add the muddy pig because @MineDrumPE already did it, and did an excellent job, you can download their resource pack on MCPEDL too.
replace the cow

title: Smooth Enchantment Glow
briefDescription: Do you not like the way bedrock handles the glow on enchanted items? No worry because I got you covered! This pack scales all enchant-able ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you not like the way bedrock handles the glow on enchanted items? No worry because I got you covered! This pack scales all enchant-able items to a x512 resolution so the enchantment glow has more pixels to work with so it can render more details in a smaller area.
Might not work for low end devices, I don?t know though. Feedback is appreciated!

title: Heckin? Chonkers Resource Pack
briefDescription: A lightweight (heh) resource pack that turns all (well, most) mobs into heckin' chonkers. I'm talking the chonkiest of chonkers. If you like your mobs ...

crawledImageUrls.text: A lightweight (heh) resource pack that turns all (well, most) mobs into heckin? chonkers. I?m talking the chonkiest of chonkers. If you like your mobs chonky, you?ll enjoy this pack!

title: A Little Taste of Jerm Bedrock Edition
briefDescription: "A Little Taste of Jerm" is my personal texture pack that I have been working on for a few years for my singleplayer series on ...

crawledImageUrls.text: ?A Little Taste of Jerm? is my personal texture pack that I have been working on for a few years for my singleplayer series on YouTube. At the start it was originally inspired by Bdouble0100?s resource pack, but it has since changed and grown a lot over the past years and now turned into a really good pack on its own.

title: Shockwave?s Bedrock Original Pack
briefDescription: This pack will bring back the old texture of Minecraft Bedrock Edition for the new 1.10 beta version of the game. If you ever miss the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This pack will bring back the old texture of Minecraft Bedrock Edition for the new 1.10 beta version of the game. If you ever miss the old texture pack of the game, this is the perfect choice for you!
This pack will bring back the old textures of all the items, blocks and mobs in the game. The textures of the Banner Pattern and the Bell was also changed to fit the old style of the game. I expect to change a few more blocks and items ?s texture to make it completely fit the old style of the game!

title: Narwhal Texture
briefDescription: Have you ever wished for narwhals in Minecraft? Well, now you can stop dreaming and make your dream come true with the Narwhal Texture Pack! ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Have you ever wished for narwhals in Minecraft? Well, now you can stop dreaming and make your dream come true with the Narwhal Texture Pack! You can be riding with the world?s most marvelous creatures.
